DIRECT ENTRY  
(i)     ABU accepts 'A' level passes in Chemistry and mathematics 
or Physics.  
   
UTME.  
(i)      ABU  requires five (5) 'O' level credit passes to include         
English  Language, Mathematics, Chemistry and    Physics 
and any    other Science subject  
  
UTME SUJECTS  
(i)  ABU requires Mathematics, Chemistry and  any other 
Science subject.
